comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Most people today have NO idea how much of a role this man played in the future of America.  Wonderful photo.

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: but those of us of Dutch heritage do  )

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Hey, I'm Dutch, too -- but from the much later Dutch migration to West Michigan. I don't think I could do tricky New York Dutch footwork like this kid is doing, with one foot on the other, hopping along while pretending to strut on a peg leg. On his way to swindle the Indians, no doubt. And by the way, isn't NYC where kids invented "Double Dutch" rope skipping?
